mapper.insert:
insert into mall_pms.pms_attr(attr_name, search_type, icon, value_select, attr_type, enable, catelog_id, show_desc) values
(#{entity.attrName}, #{entity.searchType}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.valueSelect}, #{entity.attrType}, #{entity.enable}, #{entity.catelogId}, #{entity.showDesc})

insert into mall_pms.pms_attr(attr_name, search_type, icon, value_select, attr_type, enable, catelog_id, show_desc) values
(#{entity.attrName}, #{entity.searchType}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.valueSelect}, #{entity.attrType}, #{entity.enable}, #{entity.catelogId}, #{entity.showDesc})
on duplicate key update attr_name = values(attr_name) , search_type = values(search_type) , icon = values(icon) , value_select = values(value_select) , attr_type = values(attr_type) , enable = values(enable) , catelog_id = values(catelog_id) , show_desc = values(show_desc)
